property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play an attack as a reversal, add 1 card from any player's card pool to that player's momentum.E Discard 2 momentum: If you block this attack, you may play any attack in your hand as a reversal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard your hand: Your opponent loses 5 vitality. Only playable on your first turn.R: After a control check is made, lose X vitality. That control check gets +X or -X.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you block an attack, add one reversal from your card pool or discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you have played your second attack as a reversal this turn, your opponent loses 3 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Any attack played as a reversal gets +1 damage.R Discard 1 card: After a control check is made, that check gets -1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Add the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck to their momentum: Your opponent loses 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: Your next control check this turn gets +1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next control check gets +1. Not playable if this is the first attack you have played this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E This attack gets -2 damage: Your next control check this turn gets +1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).E: This attack gets 'Powerful: 2'. Only playable if you have a weapon asset in play.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Abyss E: If this attack deals damage, add one card from your hand to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your next attack this turn is a low attack, the control check to play it gets +1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Each multiple copy of this attack gets -1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Each player adds 1 card from their discard pile to their momentum.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: Each player discards 1 card from their momentum. Only playable if each player has at least 1 momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent pays momentum to increase the damage of an attack, their next control check this turn gets -1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you have played an attack as a reversal that could not normAlly have been played as a reversal, add 1 card from the top of any player's deck to their momemtum or discard 1 momentum from any player's momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Any attack gets -3 damage (to a minimum of 1).Abyss E: Discard 1 momentum: Any attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your [Chaos] attack is blocked, remove it from the game. Take 1 card from the top of your deck and add it to your momentum.R Commit, discard 1 momentum: Before making a control check, that check is equal to the control of the discarded card (no control check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your [Chaos] attack gets 'Powerful: 1'.E Commit: Your opponent's attack gets +X speed and -X damage (minimum 1). X equals your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momentum: Before a control check is made, that check gets +X. X equals the printed difficulty of the discarded card.Cervantes R Discard 1 momentum: Before a control check is made, it gets -X. X equals the printed difficulty of the discarded card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: While this card is in your card pool, you may not gain vitality. When paying a cost that requires you to discard at least 1 momentum, you may discard the top card of your deck instead of the first required momentum.Cervantes R Lose 2 vitality: When you would clear this card from your card pool, it stays there instead. Playable while in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Any weapon attack gets -X damage. X equals your momentum.R Destroy this asset: After a control check is made, that check gets +X or -X. X equals your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Take 1 card from your discard pile and add it to your momentum. Replace this attack's Powerful ability with 'Multiple: 1'. Only playable if you have not played this card's Powerful ability this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your next high attack this turn gets 'Powerful: 1'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets 'Multiple: 1'.Cervantes E Discard 2 momentum: This attack gets 'Powerful: 2'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, while this card is in your card pool, after 1 of your other attacks deals damage, you may lose 3 vitality and place that attack in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard All your momentum: During the End Phase, each player adds every card in their card pool to their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, All control checks get -1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).E Discard 1 momentum: Your opponent's next control check this turn gets -1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you successfully block an attack with this card, discard 1 momentum to make a control check. If the control check is equal to or greater than this attack's difficulty, take 1 card from your momentum and add it to your card pool face down as a copy of this attack. Play this copy as a Reversal as normal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack (or one of its multiple copies) deals damage, your next attack this turn gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you make a control check, discard 1 random face down card from your momentum. The control check is equal to the discarded card's difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you make a control check, switch the difficulty and the control of the card used for the check.R Destroy this foundation: Before a control check is made, that check gets -2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play a Reversal, take 1 card from your hand and add it to your momentum.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: This attack may only be played as a reversal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Take the top card of your discard pile and add it to your momentum.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your next control check for an attack this turn gets +X. X equals the number of attack cards in your discard pile.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack played as a reversal is unblockable. Your opponent may discard 2 cards to negate this effect.E: Your attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage. Your opponent may discard 1 card to negate this effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Reveal your hand: When you take damage from an opponent's attack, you take 1 less damage for each reversal in your hand to a minimum of 1.E Commit, discard 1 card: Any attack gets -3 damage. If this ability reduces that attack's damage to 0 or less, your opponent may take 1 card from their hand and add it to their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you lose vitality due to an attack, your opponent discards 1 card. You may play a reversal as if you had blocked that attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momentum: After one of your attacks played as a reversal deals damage, you may immediately play another reversal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you play a reversal, your opponent discards 1 card.R Commit: After you fail to block an attack, that attack gets -2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After playing the stun ability of this card, you may choose to have your opponent discard 2 cards instead of committing foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent cannot commit 4 foundations for the stun of this attack, then your opponent must discard cards equal to the difference. If they cannot make up the difference they still discard and this attack becomes unblockable.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your opponent discards X cards. X equals the total breaker rating in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack is unblockable. Only playable if your opponent has no cards in their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool after being played as a block, any time your opponent passes a control check, they discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).Lizardman E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards 1 card.

property.value: E: Your opponent discards 1 card. Only playable if you have a reversal in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your opponent discards 1 card after any multiple copy of this card deals damage.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText

property.value: E : Draw 1 card. If this attack is completely blocked, you must discard 2 cards.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, destroy 1 Asset.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: All your attacks get +1 damage for the rest of this turn.Mitsurugi F: For the rest of this turn, your next X attacks get +1 damage and if they deal damage you may draw 1 card. X equals your momentum.

property.value: R Commit: After you block a mid attack, your opponent loses 2 vitality.R Commit: After you play the last card in your hand during your turn, draw 3 cards, end your combat phase and move to your end phase.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: E If a multiple copy of this attack deals damage, draw 1 card.

property.value: E: If this attack and its first multiple copy deal damage to your opponent, the second multiple copy of this card gets +3 damage.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: Your next attack gets +1 speed. If this attack deals damage, you may change the zone of your next attack this turn to any other.

property.value: R: After you play a foundation with a difficulty (including progressive difficulty) of 4 or more, draw 1 card.

property.value: R: After your opponent loses vitality from an attack and the lost vitality was less than the printed damage of the attack, your opponent takes damage equal to the printed damage of the attack. Only playable if your character's height and weight are less than that of your opponent.

property.value: E Commit: This attack with a multiple ability has its multiple rating increased by 1.R: When your multiple attack (not a multiple copy) deals damage, ready this card. Playable while committed.

property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, add a card from your discard pile to your hand. For the rest of this turn copies of that card get -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, make a control check against a difficulty of 5. If you succeed, you may play two attacks of printed difficulty 4 or less from your hand (no control check necessary).

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, your opponent takes 2 cards from their hand and adds them to their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this card is added to your momentum, add it face up.E: Any attack gets -2 speed (to a minimum of 1). Only playable while this card is face up in your momentum. Playable by your opponent.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Choose one of the following - All players draw 1 card and then discard 2 cards or All players commit 1 foundation and then ready 1 foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Lose 7 vitality: Double this attack's damage. If this attack is blocked, your opponent discards their hand.

property.value: E Destroy this foundation: Your opponent destroys 1 of their foundations or discards 2 cards (their choice).
